items.preText: Fahim Hakim: "Is this wicket too tough to bat on? The spinners are enjoying a great economy rate. " -- Definitely dusty and with much on offer for the slower bowlers. Plus, Raza and Waller have kept things tight. Very few loose balls.
items.text: good length on leg stump, walks across to the off side and taps off his hips to deep midwicket for a single
items.shortText: Waller to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: quicker ball, but short outside off, cut away from his body. Beats point, but there's the man in the deep for that shot
items.shortText: Waller to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: back of a length on middle stump, keeps his eyes on the ball and defends off the back foot from top of off stump
items.shortText: Waller to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: good length on middle stump once more, flicked off his pads to midwicket
items.shortText: Waller to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, eventually a low full toss. Hit off the toe end of the bat, back to the bowler, off the front foot
items.shortText: Waller to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full outside off, Mushi charges down the ground and drives past the non-striker to long on
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: back of a length outside off, waits for the ball to cross him before tapping at it fine, beats Ervine at short third man, forcing the fielder to give it a chase. Parries it in just inside the ropes
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: full on middle and leg, fended towards the leg side off the front foot
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full on off stump, spins away after gripping the surface, pokes at it and played to point
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length outside off, stays on the back foot and carves this towards cover point
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: full on off stump, turned with the spin off his hips to square leg. Raza finishes his spell with 1 for 39
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.preText: Wasi Mohsin: "Sakib, Tamim and Mushfiqur like Jaywardhane, Dilshan and Sanga. Once they retire, very hard for team to fill up places."
items.text: full on off stump, and there's the first sign of aggression from the new man. Down on one knee, and slogged over midwicket. Lands a few feet beyond the boundary
items.shortText: Waller to Mushfiqur Rahim, SIX runs

items.text: good length on middle stump, takes an extra bounce off the surface. the batsman tried to get out of the ball's way, ut smacks his shoulder instead. Surprises everyone
items.shortText: Waller to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: good length on leg stump, turned off his pads to square leg for a comfortable run
items.shortText: Waller to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full on middle stump, steps forward and taps to wide long on
items.shortText: Waller to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: good length outside leg stump, Mushfiqur walks across to the off side and turns this delivery to square leg
items.shortText: Waller to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, and that's driven firmly past cover. Two men in the deep, but it's threaded the gap between those two. Beats both men, and that's the end of an expensive over from Waller
items.shortText: Waller to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.preText: Change in bowling. Time for some pace. Muzarabani returns.
items.text: short and wide outside off, enough room for the batsman to put it away but the cut from Mushi is stopped by the diving backward-point fielder
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full and wide outside off, tries to chase at it by trying to carve this square, but misses the shot
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, can't cut this away. Bottom edges it to point. Misses out on another loose, wide ball
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: good length on middle stump, flicked off his pads to deep backward square. They walk across for the single
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: back of a length outside off, punched off the back foot to cover. Got big on Mushi
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, pulled along the carpet to deep midwicket. Well hit but straight to the man
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.preText: Here's Cremer for his third over
items.text: full outside off, turns away, driven back to Cremer
items.shortText: Cremer to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: good length outside off, tries to cut but too close to his body. Played to short third man
items.shortText: Cremer to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run
